sentence.text: We show that morpholino-mediated negative regulation of protein kinase activity loss of function in the zebrafish results in shortened body axis, microphthalmia with disorganized lens, microcephaly, reduced touch-evoked motility, and highly disorganized myofibers.

entity.text: negative regulation of protein kinase activity

sentence.text: Altogether these data demonstrate that mutations in negative regulation of protein kinase activity cause a congenital muscular dystrophy syndrome with short stature, cataracts, and intellectual disability

entity.text: negative regulation of protein kinase activity
